title: S+ is dumb
body:
today i had a game at oce server, the game was perfect leading for 38min and we lost eventually
FOR REASON, one of player ID [REMOVED] was playing MF and refuse to group. Because he only want is stupid master champ for S+.
we were leading everything but just cant get the lane push with no adc, every time we won the team fight and pushing, the full health adc went back to buy and start farming jg and lane, when we call for baron she went bot lane and farm.

i would recommend RIOT, 
1) delete this stupid things or make change such reports cancel the score of S- S S+
2) Plz, not just taking report on NA not OCE, here oce reports seem ever got take serious

replies.body: Its because the S rank is highly based on cs as a key part of it, if a player hasnt got enough cs they cant get S, though 100 cs every 15 min is usually enough to suffice.
you can get an s and play support too
Its still highly based n cs for, having high assists and heal shield on a support class champ also contributes well.
OCE and NA report systems are exactly the same system
Players will go out of the way to get Ss for champion mastery even if it means losing. Was it ranked?
